name: FISHJN
description:
"Fishjn is a rather simple thing, but its slick soundtrack and '80s techno vibe are great, and sticking to various funky fishgrooves feels nicely satisfying." - Rock Paper Shotgun "What really makes the experience enjoyable is the music, which consists of easy-going electronic music with gracious synths and more up-tempo beats for the more challenging fish." - Indiestatik

FISHJN' is an electro dance fishing game, where you have to match the fish's patterns to the beat to catch it.

OST download coming soon!

Made by KO-OP with music by Marskye
